12.content:
Months after the battle with Pain.

*Knock, Knock, Knock*... *Knock, Knock, Knock*

Naruto Staring at the door waiting to see who it is and whether he can trust them with his current state. As the door creaked open a girl with pale blue hair wearing blue and black (Picture of her: http://img00.deviantart.net/7524/i/2011/...) walks in. At first Naruto couldn't exactly tell who it is but it soon came clear to him who it was.

"Konan, what is she doing here. I thought she left the village" Naruto said to himself. "Naruto. Naruto are you in here" Konan said as she looked around the room for him. This was Naruto's one chance to get her attention from someone who he could trust.

Naruto quickly sprinted over to Konan before she even made a move. "HEY KONAN DOWN HERE" Naruto yelled while running to her. "I wonder where he could be" said Konan as she began to walk forward. Naruto saw her begin to walk forward and quickly moved out of her way before getting stepped on by her.

"Wait where is she going" Naruto said while stopping to see where she was headed. Konan walked over to Naruto's window and opened it "I'll send out a paper bird to find his Chakra" she said making 10 origami paper birds. "Go" she said commanding the paper birds and the moment the birds flew out the window they quickly shot back in and bolt right toward Naruto.

"Waaaa" Naruto yelled while trying to dodge every single one of them. "Huh" Konan said confused on how her Birds acted. Naruto completly shocked after almost being impaled stood there as Konan walked toward the group of fallen paper birds.

Konan squatted down and investigated every single paper bird "Hmm that's strange" she said looking straight down. Naruto saw Konan looking down at the area where he was and began to jump up and down screaming her name.

'KONAN I'M RIGHT HERE ON THE FLOOR" he screamed. Konan heard a his voice but took a glance at the window thinking it was a voice from outside, then turned back toward the birds. "Damn, she didn't even hear me. Alright I have an idea, Multi-Shadow Clone Jutsu" he said and created about 30 other clones then yelled her name once again "KONAN, LOOK DOWN HERE".

"What Naruto is that you" she said bending lower and looking at all of the tiny Narutos. "Yeah its me, I don't know how but I woke up all tiny like this on the floor" he explained. "I see" she said lifting him up with one of the paper birds and brought him up to her face.

"Woah" he said floating straight up. "Sorry about that" she said. "Its okay, so what are you doing here" he asked
12.title: Konan
